topic.title: Unit Left Scene Time - conformance rules

lines.i: Time the unit left the incident scene

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.43"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11148)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10855)/@code="69475-2" Responding unit left the scene with a patient [Date and time] Vehicle NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10854)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="TS" (CONF:10856)
NEMSIS Trace: ETimes.09
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11148)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10855)/@code="69475-2" Responding unit left the scene with a patient [Date and time] Vehicle NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10854)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="TS" (CONF:10856)
NEMSIS Trace: ETimes.09
